flavorText: mise 'mīz v [alter. of might as well] (1997) 1: to win when you don't deserve to 2: to top-deck the "tings" you need 3: to be rewarded by an opponent's bad luck 4: to coin a phrase that spreads through the tournament scene like wildfire 5: to fling a monkey 6: to split firewood using a sharp instrument 7: To burn
name: Mise
originalText: Name a nonland card, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card is the named card, draw three cards.
text: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.
